original_text: And Joab sent messengers to David and said, “I have fought against Rabbah; moreover, I have taken the city of waters.
korean_text: 요압이 전령을 다윗에게 보내 이르되 내가 랍바 곧 물들의 성읍을 쳐서 점령하였으니

sentences.original_text: And Joab sent messengers to David and said,
moreover, I have taken the city of waters.
